comment: Domain of an operation given by the maps-to notation, closed form of ~ dmmpt2 . Caution: This theorem is only valid in the very special case where the value of the mapping is a constant! (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Jun-2017.) (Proof shortened by AV, 10-Feb-2019.)
